user_session_mismatch: User session mismatch detected. Please restart the application.
error_occured_while_verifying_session: An error occurred while verifying your session. Please try again or log in again.
password_entered_is_incorrect: The password entered is incorrect. Please try again.
error_invalid_aes_key_size: Invalid AES key size. Expected 32 bytes, received {received}.
unexpected_error_occurred: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
authentification_failed: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials.
user_settings_file_could_not_be_found: The user settings file could not be found. Please ensure the application is properly installed or try restarting it.
unable_load_user_settings_file: Unable to load the user settings file. Please ensure the application is properly installed or try restarting it.
error_when_reading_json_file:
An error occurred while reading or parsing the settings file.

' + 'This may be due to invalid JSON format.
error_ocurred_while_loading_editor_setti: An error occurred while loading editor settings. Please ensure the settings file is accessible and properly formatted.
preference_saved: Your preferences have been successfully saved.
error_occurred_while_saving_preferences: An error occurred while saving your preferences. Please try again.
default_settings_not_found_message: Unable to locate default settings. Please save your current preferences before attempting a reset.
settings_reset_message: Your settings have been successfully reset to default.
reset_settings_message_failed: An error occurred while resetting your settings. Please try again.
registration_error_message: An unexpected error occurred while finalizing registration. Please try again.
keybindings_file_missing_message: The shortcut configuration file could not be found. Please ensure your installation is complete or try reinstalling the application.
keybindings_load_message_error: An error occurred while reading the shortcut configuration file. Please verify the file format or reset your settings.
theme_settings_could_not_be_found:
